Subject: Dark Landing

Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:



A craft shaped like an egg flipped through space, slowly approaching the blue 
ball in a sea of black called Earth.  Fire erupted from the back of the 
strange craft, which at a first glance would make one think that the strange 
thing was on fire.

But in reality several boosters in the back had activated, and the once 
spinning egg was now moving at an incredible speed steadily, without 
spinning.  It reached the atmosphere in seconds, and continued on a direct 
course for what would be known as Mt. St. Hilary, the place where the Autobot 
craft crashed.

The ship stopped suddenly, without slowing down, fifteen feet from the ground.
